googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Kim Pomo
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Keith Agee, owner of this business is one of the best!  He did a fantastic job putting my metal shed together.  Very prompt, polite and reasonably priced.  Will definitely be calling him agsin
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText:
Dear Kim Pomo,

Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review. We truly appreciate your feedback and are thrilled to hear that you had a positive experience with us. Your review means a lot to our team. If there's anything else we can do for you, please don't hesitate to reach out.

Best regards,
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Shoals Creek Home Improvements

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Joe F.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Showing up on time, quality workmanship at a fair price are what you'll get when you hire Keith! Refreshing to know that the job will be completed as agreed with no surprises!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText:
Dear joe F ,

Thank you so much for your kind review! We're delighted to hear that you had a positive experience with us. It's our goal to provide excellent service, and we're thrilled that we hit the mark for you. Your feedback is invaluable to us.

If you have any further questions or if there's anything else we can assist you with, please feel free to reach out. We look forward to serving you again soon!

Warm regards,
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Shoals Creek Home Improvements

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Rita Kasmeier
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: I would like to thank Keith Agee at Shoals Creek Home Improvement for a wonderful job well done at my home. He arrived on time and friendly. The price for job was nothing compared to the skills and work he performed.  I will definitely call him again.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText:
Dear Rita Kasmeier

Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. We really appreciate your feedback.

We're thrilled to hear that you had a positive experience with us at shoals creek home improvements and it's great to know that we met your expectations.

Your satisfaction is our priority, and we look forward to serving you again. If you have any further feedback or questions, please feel free to reach out.

Best regards,

Keith Agee
Shoals creek home improvements
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Shoals Creek Home Improvements

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: judith R
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: Creative, attentive. Reliable. Generous with his ideas and his time.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText:
Dear Judith R

Thank you so much for your thoughtful review! We greatly appreciate your feedback and are delighted to hear about your positive experience with us at shoals creek home improvements. 

At SC home improvements we strive to provide exceptional service, offer quality workmanship, and it's wonderful to know that we met your expectations.

Your satisfaction is very important to us, and we look forward to continuing to serve you. If you have any further comments or questions, please feel free to reach out to us.

Keith Agee
Shoals Creek Home Improvements

aboutUs: At Shoals Creek Home Improvements, we are a team of highly skilled and experienced professionals dedicated to providing top-notch plumbing and home improvement services to the residents of the Shoals Creek area. Our local expertise and commitment to excellence ensure that every project we undertake is completed with precision and attention to detail, leaving you with a home that exceeds your expectations.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the peace of mind that comes with choosing a trusted local plumbing and home improvement company that prioritizes quality workmanship and customer satisfaction.
sellingPoints: Fully licensed and insured professionals with extensive knowledge of local building codes and regulations.
Comprehensive range of services, from routine plumbing repairs to complete bathroom and kitchen remodels.
Commitment to using only the highest-quality materials and cutting-edge techniques for long-lasting results.
